column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Monday December 28 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Advisory for Elm Tree Ln:
column4: Traffic signals will be dark at E Second St and Corral St intersections thru Friday January 1 for traffic signal work.

column3: Traffic Advisory for Elm Tree Ln:
column4: All-way stop signs will be in place for traffic control.  Use added caution if traveling in this area.
The ferry is closed until further notice due to high water conditions.
